DataElement.preferredName: Two or More New Bone Lesions Since Previous Bone Scan Confirmation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether 2 or more new lesions were confirmed since the previous bone scan.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Two or More New Bone Lesions Since Previous Bone Scan Confirmation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether there are two or more bone tumors that have not been previously seen or characterized._Subsequent to; after._Occurring prior to something else._A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism._Having been established or verified.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Two or More New Bone Lesions Indicator
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether there are two or more bone tumors that have not been previously seen or characterized.

Concepts.longName: Two or More New Bone Lesions Indicator
Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether there are two or more bone tumors that have not been previously seen or characterized.

Property.preferredDefinition: Subsequent to; after.:Occurring prior to something else.:A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism.:Having been established or verified.

Concepts.definition: A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.
